      • Schedule

        public Schedule​()
        constructor for Schedule The constructor of Schedule should create an empty ArrayList of Courses. The title should be initialized to my Schedule.

    • Method Detail

      • addCourseToSchedule

        public boolean addCourseToSchedule​(Course c)
        add add the Course to the end of the schedule and return true if the Course was added.
        Parameters:
        c - course that is going to be added
        Returns:
        true if the course is successfully added
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if conflict or already same course exists

      • removeCourseFromSchedule

        remove course from schedule
        Parameters:
        c - course that is going to be removed
        Returns:
        true if removed

      • resetSchedule

        public void resetSchedule​()
        create a new schedule ArrayList and reset the title to the default value.

      • getScheduledCourses

        public java.lang.String[][] getScheduledCourses​()
        should return a 2D array of Course information. Each row should be a Course and the columns are name, section, title, and the meeting string
        Returns:
        a 2D array of Course information
